General.Name: Haisung TPC Co. Ltd.
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Haisung TPC Co., Ltd manufactures and sells gears, decelerators, and accelerators in South Korea and internationally. It offers decelerators for elevators, escalators, stages and parking towers, construction equipment, robotics, and wind power generation; endless winders; geared motor decelerators; industrial decelerators; tower crane decelerators; cycloid decelerators; turning gears for ships; gondola systems; and precision gears. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
General.Address: Namdong Industrial Complex, Incheon, South Korea, 405-821
